price: 9. ¿Acaso no sabe que se harán surgir a quienes están en las tumbas
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
